name: Borderlands 2: Tiny Tina's Assault on Dragon Keep
name_original: Borderlands 2: Tiny Tina's Assault on Dragon Keep
description:
Borderlands 2: Tiny Tina's Assault on Dragon Keep is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It came out on 25-06-2013. It was published by 2K Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Borderlands 2: Tiny Tina's Assault on Dragon Keep is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
